name: Thin Blue Line
description:
Controls - Arrow keys for one player and ESDF for the other on keyboards, or joypads to move. 

"It's the commissioner here...

YOUR COMMANDER IN CHIEF!

Red citizens are upstanding,

Let them pass.

Green citizens are trouble...

STOP THEM AT ALL COSTS!

You are the Thin Blue Line...

GET READY!!!" 

Made on a train in 36 hours for #Locomojam19, 

by Kirk Winner and Alex Butterfield ( @Lifeboat_Alex ), audio by Tommy Rouch
